name: Hero Herder
description:
You control a squad of heroes and you must direct them in order to protect a small innocent kitten. Move the flag around to change where your heroes fly towards/around.

Controls:

Left Click - Add hero to scene (also adds a new enemy spawn!)

Right Click - Move hero rally point

Description:

This is a prototype testing out applications for flocking algorithms and using HDR+Bloom postprocessing for lasers and laser particles.
